CONCLUSION
This invention encompasses various embodiments of an integrated verification system that addresses
critical needs in product authentication, compliance monitoring, and market access for small-scale
producers. The modular design allows adaptation to different industries, regulatory frameworks, and
technological environments while maintaining the core functionality of creating verifiable, immutable
records that enable both compliance and market participation.
The invention can be adapted to various operational scales, geographic conditions, and regulatory
requirements while preserving the fundamental innovation of integrating multiple verification
methods into a unified, blockchain-enabled workflow that operates effectively in low-connectivity
